pageContext.claim: “I won that [Georgia] by hundreds of thousands of votes. Everybody knows it. You go down the streets, there are Trump/Pence signs all over the place. We won that by hundreds of thousands, Georgia.”
pageContext.analysis: Biden won Georgia by a narrow margin. After a massive registration drive by Democrats, Georgia is evenly split between the two parties -- as shown by the Senate races the Democrats won on Jan. 5 -- so this claimed margin of victory for Trump is ridiculous. He won the state by about 200,000 votes in 2016, and the margin was only going to shrink in 2020.
